Entries.default: "It just me or are those eyes following us?"
"One of Eora's greatest wonders, and it's infested with eyeballs. Lovely."
"You ever get that feeling you're being watched?"
"Every book here is a lie or a stolen dream. It is nothing to be impressed by."
"Careful now, Ydwin. Don't be falling while you gawping at them books."
"We are under very close scrutiny. I wonder how much this place understands what it sees."
"Been wonderin' why we don't see chanters much - now I know why. The oral tradition never stood a chance."
"Do you think they can see us?"
"Absolutely incredible. I may let you leave me here, captain."
"Look at this place! Arkemyr's library is a footnote to the glory of this collection..."
